column4: anyone can help with the kernel compiling with the same version of ubuntu? i need to have the exact same version .deb package compiled by me with my patches...  Same version so i can still use the restricted modules
I think you can get the source from linux-source
i got the right source from git but when i compile it with fakeroot make-kpkg --initrd --append-to-version=generic kernel_image kernel_headers     I always get the wrong version
yeah, I dunno.  Maybe you need to get it from linux-source, and not git
